name: Alex Morgan
description: Passionate about creating intuitive user experiences with a focus on accessibility and inclusive design. Specializes in user research and prototyping to create products that truly meet user needs.

experience.description: Lead designer for multiple high-profile projects, focusing on creating accessible and intuitive interfaces.
Designed user interfaces for web and mobile applications, collaborating closely with development teams.

name: Jordan Lee
description: Specializes in building responsive, performant web applications using modern JavaScript frameworks. Passionate about clean code and optimized user experiences.

experience.description: Developing modern web applications with React and Next.js, focusing on performance optimization and responsive design.
Built and maintained client websites using JavaScript, HTML, and CSS.

name: Taylor Kim
description: Strategic thinker with a knack for translating business requirements into user-centered product features. Experienced in leading cross-functional teams to deliver successful products.

experience.description: Leading product development from conception to launch, working closely with design, engineering, and marketing teams.
Assisted in product development lifecycle, gathered user feedback, and helped prioritize feature development.

name: Casey Rivera
description: Creates compelling content strategies that engage users and improve information architecture. Expert in SEO optimization and content management systems.

experience.description: Developing comprehensive content strategies for clients across various industries, with a focus on SEO and user engagement.
Created engaging content for websites, blogs, and social media platforms.

name: Morgan Zhang
description: Builds end-to-end solutions with a focus on scalability, performance, and maintainable code. Experienced in both frontend and backend technologies.

experience.description: Developing complete web applications from database design to frontend implementation, with a focus on scalable architecture.
Built robust backend systems using Node.js, Express, and various database technologies.

name: Riley Patel
description: Ensures digital products are accessible to all users, regardless of abilities or disabilities. Expert in WCAG guidelines and assistive technologies.

experience.description: Conducting accessibility audits and providing recommendations to make digital products more inclusive and compliant with accessibility standards.
Developed websites with a strong focus on accessibility and inclusive design principles.
